item.description:
The Nashua Telegraph is sponsoring their annual Encore Superstar karaoke competition. This evening is their first of 4 qualifying evenings at 4 different locations. Competitors sign in starting at 7 PM and the competition starts at 8 PM. There is no charge for either competing or watching.

I will be competing. You are free to compete too.

This venue is pretty small and the contest usually draws a big crowd, so I can't guarantee that I'll be able to save seats for everyone, so get here early to stake out space.

I plan to get here by 7 to sign in right away but I might disappear for awhile, if I can, to warm up my voice.

We can discuss how to handle meeting and seating when you sign up to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: If you don't know me already, I'll make some arrangement after you sign up"
item.name: Karaoke Contest
